attributes.action: Request an extension to the Brexit deadline
attributes.background: Boris Johnson should respect the wishes of parliament and the general public to avoid No Deal Brexit by requesting a Brexit Deadline extension. The Prime Minister to should request an extension of our Article 50 arrangement for at least 6 months.
